item.title: Slides
item.description: Welcome to my slides. As I learn, I find it easy to take notes in a markdown file. I've turned my notes into slides using Reveal.js. This is an excellent presentation framework built in HTML / Javascript. You can build excellent presentations off your markdown files. I plan to convert more of my notes into slide in the days to come. Stay tuned … Design / Architecture SOLID - Object oriented design principles (Robert C Martin)

item.title: About me
item.description: Accomplished software development leader and a passionate technologist dedicated to continuous learning and professional growth. When I'm not working, I love to bike, hike, play badminton or ping-pong. Disclaimer: The opinions expressed herein are my own personal opinions and do not represent my employerâ€™s view in any way.
